definition: conservation (e.g. of energy, momentum or heat in physics)/to remain constant (of a number)
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

sentences.english: The T-parity was required to be conserved or it could have a very small breaking.
sentences.chinese: 宇称要求近似守恒或者有着非常小的破缺。

sentences.english: The unified symmetry and conserved quantity of the holonomic mechanical systems with remainder coordinates are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究有多余坐标完整系统的对称性与守恒量。

sentences.english: Energy is conserved in all of its forms.
sentences.chinese: 能量在其任何形式都是守恒的。

sentences.english: The key problem of the reaction chromatography is the initial-boundary value problem for hyperbolic conservation laws systems.
sentences.chinese: 反应色谱的核心问题是双曲守恒律的初边值问题。

sentences.english: The hyperbolic conservation laws with relaxation appear in many physical systems such as nonequilibrium gas dynamics, flood flow with friction, magnetohydrodynamics, etc.
sentences.chinese: 带松弛项的双曲型守恒律组出现在诸多的物理系统中。

sentences.english: This is in contradiction to caloric-theory notion of conservation of heat.
sentences.chinese: 这种观点和热质论关于热量守恒的观念相矛盾。

sentences.english: In this paper it is shown that there are two vector constants of the motion for a charged particle in the central field of force.
sentences.chinese: 证明了带电粒子在有心力场中运动时有两个守恒矢量。

sentences.english: It talks about the conservation of energy.
Then we give the conservation laws of ZK-MEW equation.
sentences.chinese: 最后得到了此方程的守恒律。

sentences.english: The generalized Riemann problem for a class of decoupled nonlinear hyperbolic system of conservation laws is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究一类解耦非线性双曲守恒律系统的广义黎曼问题。

sentences.english: In your collaborations, always remember that "credit" is not a conserved quantity.
sentences.chinese: 再合作钟，腰牢记荣誉钚湜壹戈守恒得量。

sentences.english: The teacher said, everything is a conservation of mass.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，万事万物都是质量守恒的。
也就是，总能量是守恒的。

sentences.english: The universality of the law of conservation of energy was not generally accepted until 1847.
sentences.chinese: 能量守恒定律的普适性直到1847年才得到公认。
